Add/Replace/Delete.Description: These attributes are used in a definition to Add/Delete/Replace an attribute to the Definition.
Add/Replace/Delete.Name: Add/Replace/Delete

Default.Description: This attribute is used to specify the TDL expression which will be used if the match is not found
Default.Name: Default

Key.Description: This attribute is used to specify the list of key constant values which will be used as keys for the map to search
Key.Name: Key

Key Type.Description: This attribute is used to allow the specification of data type for the key of a map

Parameters.Keywords: Error Id, Long, String, Sys Id

Key Type.Name: Key Type

Key Value.Description: This attribute is used to specify the map between the key and the TDL expression
Key Value.Name: Key Value

Use.Description: This attribute is used as a keyword in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use
